objects.name: message2
objects.string: Click/touch an empty area to set destination, use left mouse button to drag obstacles

events.comment: If player speed is > 0 so it is moving, set text "I'm on my way"
If player speed is 0 so it is not moving, set text "Waiting for destination"
If left mouse button is down or touch held, set player to move to the position of the mouse.
If left mosue button is released and no path is found, set text "I can't go there"
set position of text to be at the player
If a unit is clicked, select it
